attributes.action: Make car insurance rates equal by law for men and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years now there has been discrimination against men in insurance and even now there is women only insurance companies.

Taking my example a 1.0L corsa third party fire and theft 17year old peson- £1200

Taking my girlfriends as a example a1.4L corsa fully comp 17 year old person- £700

surely this is a matter of discrimination against men
